title: Onboard a New Seller Client
description: An agent has secured a new listing. They need to onboard the client, including signing the listing agreement.

tasks.description: Create a new client profile in the CRM with the seller's contact information and property details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters the new client's data into the CRM.

tasks.description: Generate a listing agreement with the agreed-upon commission rate and listing term.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correct and complete listing agreement.

tasks.description: Send the listing agreement to the seller for electronic signature and provide a welcome packet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the agreement and a welcome packet email.
